**Application**: Quantitative Trait Loci Analysis       
**Created**: 06-2016                      
**By**: Dennis van Muijen en David Nieuwenhuijse                
**Version**: 0.1                   
**Email**: dennis.vanmuijen@gmail.com, davidnieuwenhuijse@gmail.com             
**Platform**: R Shiny               

**Usage**:
This shiny app provides means for interactive qtl analysis. Functions of the qtl package are used in conjunction with visualisations in ggplot and ggiraph. Several toy datasets and the analysis of the RIL population for the distance learning module are supported.
